```{r}
# reading libaries
library(tidyverse)
library(MuMIn)
library(spBayes)
```

```{r}
# reading data
trees <- read.table("data/Dryad.Upload.11.1013.Trees.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, na.strings = "") %>% select(-contains("X"))
soils <- read.table("data/Dryad.Upload.11.1013.Soils.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, na.strings = "") %>% select(-contains("."))
```

```{r}
# playing around with the data
trees$T2Diam <- as.numeric(trees$T2Diam)
trees$T1Diam <- as.numeric(trees$T1Diam)
trees$T0Diam <- as.numeric(trees$T0Diam)
trees %>% mutate(growth = T2Diam -  T0Diam)
```

```{r}
trees %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = ends_with("Diam"),
               names_to = "diamtime",
               values_to = "diameter") %>%
  mutate(diamtime)
  group_by(UID) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = diameter)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
# making and comparing models with aicc
model1 <- lm(growth ~ )
AICc(model1)
```

```{r}
summary(model1)$r.squared
```
